chapter.text: Ahale-kitaba o musarekadera madhye yara kaphera chila, tara pratyabartana karata na yataksana na tadera kache suspasta pramana asata.
Arthat allahara ekajana rasula, yini abrtti karatena pabitra sahipha
Apara kitaba praptara ye bibhranta hayeche, ta hayeche tadera kache suspasta pramana asara pare'i.
Taderake echara kona nirdesa kara hayani ye, tara khamti mane ekanisthabhabe allahara ebadata karabe, namaya kayema karabe ebam yakata debe. Eta'i sathika dharma.
Ahale-kitaba o musarekadera madhye yara kaphera, tara jahannamera agune sthayibhabe thakabe. Tara'i srstira adhama.
Yara imana ane o satkarma kare, tara'i srstira sera.

Tadera palanakartara kache rayeche tadera pratidana cirakala basabasera jannata, yara taladese nirjharini prabahita. Tara sekhane thakabe anantakala. Allaha tadera prati santusta ebam tara allahara prati santusta. Eta tara jan'ye, ye tara palanakartake bhaya kara.
